sourcesContent:
import { Component, EventEmitter, Output } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.css'] }) export class NavbarComponent { @Output() sideNavToogled=new EventEmitter(); menuStatus: boolean=false; SideNavToogle(){ this.menuStatus=!this.menuStatus; this.sideNavToogled.emit(this.menuStatus); } }
